 DRILL BIT is a known Predacon, generally regarded as little more than 'dum=

<NEW>

For the moment, as the PREDACON dug ove=
r through the tunnel, and hten popping out a moment later  the PREDACON tra=
nsformed out of his beast mode over to his robot.  "Maximals.  YOu have oth=
er whelps with you."  Hissing over and holding his arms up in front of him,=
 his weapons charged but not shooting at them.


<OLD - TUSCON>


Tucson co=
ntinues to watch Drill Bit carefully. He also knew that his dragon
mode was=
 a little bit more suited for dealing with strangers since it was easy
to w=
ard them off as a large predator. He makes the transformation as silently
a=
s possible and then remains hidden, but with a little bit of a rumbling gro=
wl
to his voice. It would be just enough to make himself heard and determin=
ed as
an apex predator who is not to be toiled with.

<NEW - VICE GRIP>

OO=
C - And VICE GRIP would be barely known by anyone at all, even on Earth.  H=
E was one of Megatron's flunkies on Cybertron 'before' he went to the Beast=
 Wars and wasn't among the group Megatron took to Earth or was part of the =
Golden Disk raids.  So the most likely person who would be somewaht familia=
r with him is someone who's in the Cybertronian Law Enforcement division, a=
nd thus would be familiar with Predacon criminals and underworld types.  He=
 would most likely register as unknown other than Predacon allegiance on IF=
F if that worked, though I'm fine with someone knowing a bit about him.  Ju=
st be realistic over in how they got that data - Big Convoy is much likelie=
r to have a whiff of an idea of who a relatively minor Predacon with a repu=
tation for being a thug than Tuscon is, for example.

For the moment, VICE =
GRIP stayed behind over DRILL BIT as the Bugacon popped out into the cavern=
, and remained relatively stealthed behind them, but at the close range in =
the tunnels he was fairly easy to spot on, as well as his noted staying bac=
k and away, nots peaking.
